Resumé

Experienced data visualization, public health, and communications analyst with a proven track record in design, data analysis, visualization, and strategic science communication. Proficient in R, Python, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and D3.js. Skilled in graphic design and visual communication with a commitment to advancing science, health, and evidence-based policy.

Experience

Data Visualization Analyst, Developer, and Designer
